pullrequest.title: Fix compilation against AtlasInterface to not need root perms

content.raw:
To test, should be enough to source the usual /usr/share/drcsim/setup.sh and launch things in the new way:

```drcsim_gazebo lala.launch```.

There are some warnings about deprecated stuff, but I would like to keep this pull request as minimal as possible.
content.html:
To test, should be enough to source the usual /usr/share/drcsim/setup.sh and launch things in the new way:

drcsim_gazebo lala.launch.

There are some warnings about deprecated stuff, but I would like to keep this pull request as minimal as possible.
